ygData.subject: questions and suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all! The guild on Rodcet Nife is growing!  we are 7 now woohoo! David...when you guilded Genesius on Rodcet did you make him and officer or leader?  It
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all!

The guild on Rodcet Nife is growing! we are 7 now woohoo!

David...when you guilded Genesius on Rodcet did you make him and officer or
leader? It seems as though he is not leader, it would be good to make him
or me leader so we can start a command structure in the rodcet nife guild ;)

I have a suggestion: we should make up a short description of the guild for
poele who ask what our guild is about, then we can make it a hot button!!!

What is the URL wor the Mystic Alliance website?

I ahve a proposal for a guild event. How about a big lottery for publicity?
I ahve it all worked out in my head as to how we could run it. Big fun. we
would need at leats 1 person on each server in the guild to commit to it, we
can deicde a time and iron out the kinks. anyonw think this is a good
idea?? ehhe verye five minutes we could press our guild hotbutton for
publicity :) or make a special hot button just for the occasion!

Hope eveyrone is doing well? how is the guild doing on other servers?

Anyone on Rodcet Nife need to be guilded??? Nate, make a new chatchter! :)

-joe
